short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a 'Next week' button to DSW's course schedule.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your course browsing experience by adding a handy 'Next week' button to the existing set of filters - It's the quickest way to look up the nearest classes, better than "Upcoming classes" and "Whole semester"! This addon filters classes by the next given week, monday to sunday, skipping any unnecessary entries.

Available in Polish, English, Ukrainian and Russian.

[Note: this is a student project. This addon is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with the University of Lower Silesia.]
